name: asana-mcp-server
title: Asana MCP Server
summary: Asana MCP Server allows AI assistants and applications to access the Asana Work Graph from outside the Asana platform.
description: Asana MCP Server allows AI assistants and applications to access the Asana Work Graph from outside the Asana platform.

useCases.name: Access Asana data from compatible AI applications
useCases.description: Access Asana data from compatible AI applications

useCases.name: Create and manage tasks and projects
useCases.description: Create and manage tasks and projects through natural language

useCases.name: Generate reports and summaries
useCases.description: Generate reports and summaries based on Asana data

useCases.name: Analyze project data
useCases.description: Analyze project data and get AI-powered suggestions

asanaOAuth.description: OAuth2 (authorization code) for user authentication. Managed OAuth details may be provided separately.
